answers.answer: Circumcision would reduce your chances for developing further infections.  Having diabetes increases your infection risk, so best to take your physician's advice.

question: hi iam 32 years and suffering with type 1 diabeties since 7 years.. from six months i m suffering with penis infection. fore skin on penis tightens causing pain and burning sensation when moving forward and backward. some type of white subsance is seen beneth fore skin. i m feeling itchy.. when met doctor he suggested me to have circumcised.. but i dont the advantages and disadvantages of being circumcised.. plz help me to know whether there are any medicine/ cure available for the above problem without being circumcised
title: penis infection
